helio.materialiser.evaluator

Class TransformFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.evaluator.Functions
      • helio.materialiser.evaluator.TransformFunctions

  • public class TransformFunctions
extends Functions
    This class provides a set of functions to transform String into other representations
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

      This method encodes the input value as a Base 64
      static java.lang.String escapeHtml3(java.lang.String value)
      This method translates a String into a compatible URL, for instance transforms text like ' ' into URL special char %20
      static java.lang.String escapeHtml4(java.lang.String value)
      This method translates a String into a compatible URL, for instance transforms text like 'รก' into the character 'a&acute'

      This method generates the hash code of the input value

      This method parses an HTML document
